common

Class ImageReadErrorException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • common.ImageReadErrorException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ImageReadErrorException
extends java.lang.Exception
    This exception is thrown when the running application is terminated abruptly. It can be further examined using the Throwable.getCause() method. The class encapsulates the standard Java checked exception, enhancing it with customised error handling and reporting capabilities.
    Since:
    13 August 2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructs a BatchErrorException instance with the specified error message.
      ImageReadErrorException(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Constructs a BatchErrorException instance with the specified detail error message and the cause.
      ImageReadErrorException(java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Constructs a BatchErrorException instance with the specified cause.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageReadErrorException

        public ImageReadErrorException()
        Constructs a default BatchErrorException instance without an error message. The underlying cause of the exception is not set initially, but can be specified later by calling the Throwable.initCause(Throwable) method.

      • ImageReadErrorException

        public ImageReadErrorException(java.lang.String message)
        Constructs a BatchErrorException instance with the specified error message. The underlying cause of the exception is not set initially, but can be specified later by calling the Throwable.initCause(Throwable) method.
        Parameters:
        message - the error message, which can be retrieved later using the Throwable.getMessage() method

      • ImageReadErrorException

        public ImageReadErrorException(java.lang.Throwable cause)
        Constructs a BatchErrorException instance with the specified cause. The detail error message is set to: 
         (cause == null ? null : cause.toString())
        This typically contains the class and the detail error message associated with the specified cause.
        Parameters:
        cause - the underlying cause of this exception, which can be retrieved later using the Throwable.getCause() method. A null value is permitted, indicating that the cause is either non-existent or unknown

      • ImageReadErrorException

        public ImageReadErrorException(java.lang.String message,
                               java.lang.Throwable cause)
        Constructs a BatchErrorException instance with the specified detail error message and the cause.
        Parameters:
        message - the detail error message, which can be retrieved later using the Throwable.getMessage() method
        cause - the underlying cause of this exception, which can be retrieved later using the Throwable.getCause() method. A null value is permitted, indicating that the cause is either non-existent or unknown
